quote: To cure sometimes, to relieve often, to comfort always.
author: Dr. Edward Livingston Trudeau

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: How very little can be done under the spirit of fear.
author: Florence Nightingale

quote: We see with our brains, not our eyes.
author: Dr. Oliver Sacks

quote: The child is the foundation of society.
author: Dr. Abraham Jacobi

quote: The work is not small when it is rightly done.
author: Dr. Elizabeth Blackwell

quote: I must go wherever my patients call me.
author: Mary Seacole

quote: The brain is a vast unexplored world.
author: Dr. Wilder Penfield

quote: Rehabilitation is the key to healing.
author: Dr. Robert Jones

quote: Excellence of performance will transcend artificial barriers.
author: Dr. Charles R. Drew

quote: Every patient is a story, not just a statistic.
author: Dr. Vincent T. DeVita Jr.

quote: Through hard work and perseverance, anything is possible.
author: Dr. Benjamin Carson

quote: The idea that some lives matter less is the root of all that is wrong with the world.
author: Paul Farmer

quote: Take a free hour every day for exercise, for a sound body leads to a sound mind.
author: Maimonides

quote: The stethoscope is the most powerful tool to listen to the heart of a patient.
